firstmeeting: ^Oi, you silly bird. What are you? A crow? A raven? I've got no bloody idea. But that doesn't matter!

c-0: ^Well, let's get on with it then!

theLantern: ^If you head over to the West, there's a heap of lanterns. Pretty sure you'll need them where you're going!

c-0: ^Oh sod off, if you get stuck in the dark that's your fault!
c-1: ^The caves are dark, so you'll need some help

theQuest: ^What you need to do is go and collect the potion that is in the back of the cave to the East, and bring it back here. Simple! Even an idi... *cough* um... crow like you could do it!
